backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access‑controlled player profiles, score submission with rate limiting, and data structures for scores, daily challenges, and stats.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list providing short descriptions of all frontend files and their roles in the game.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router routes, theme provider, and global layout components.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, footer, and outlet for pages.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: Utility component handling loading, error, empty, and success UI states.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication flow and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTable: Displays a styled leaderboard table with ranks, players, scores, and difficulty, highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/ResultsShareCard: Renders a shareable score card and provides copy-to-clipboard and image download actions.
Provides a multi‑step tutorial modal that guides users through game basics and modes.
frontend/src/game/controls.ts: Manages keyboard and touch input to produce directional and boost actions for gameplay.
frontend/src/game/engine.ts: Implements the game loop, handling movement, spawning, collisions, scoring, and deterministic randomness.
frontend/src/game/renderCanvas.ts: Initializes the canvas and renders the player, obstacles, collectibles, and background each frame.
frontend/src/game/rng.ts: Provides a simple seeded random number generator with helpers for ranges and choices.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for game configuration, entities, state, and input.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, high scores, daily challenges, and submitting scores via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light/dark themes and global typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing hero banner, game mode navigation, and tutorial overlay handling.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsPage.tsx: Displays leaderboards with multiple score filters, fetching data and highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/pages/PlayDailyPage.tsx: Initializes and runs the daily challenge game loop, handling canvas setup, controls, scoring, pausing, and navigation on game over.
frontend/src/pages/PlayStandardPage.tsx: Initializes and runs the standard game loop, manages pause, score, navigation, and canvas rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the user's profile and stats, with authentication checks and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows game-over results, submits scores when authenticated, and provides replay/navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides toggles for audio and accessibility settings using the settings store.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store persisting whether the tutorial was dismissed, with actions to dismiss or reset.
frontend/src/state/progressionStore.ts: Zustand store for progression data like speed multipliers, best scores, streaks, and tutorial completion.
frontend/src/state/settingsStore.ts: Zustand store managing sound and motion settings with toggle actions.
frontend/src/utils/dateKey.ts: Generates a UTC day key and formats day keys into human-readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/renderCardToImage.ts: Renders an HTML element to a canvas-based image and provides a helper to download the resulting blob.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, layout, animations, and fonts, plus plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing game concept goals, required images, and a list of implemented high‑level features with versioning.
